author: Beachbum319
title: Games on the Go
review:
Bought this recently through eBay.  Quite expensive but very much worth it if you have kids who love Lego as well as playing games.  It's got a nice mix of games to choose from.

Box/Instructions

Sturdy box and clear enough instructions.

Parts

Really bought this for the clear 16x16 plates, everything else was gravy.

Minifigures

nice "microfigs"

The build

Very easy build

The completed model

 

Overall opinion

Should have seen this back in 2009, would have stocked on these to resell later on...
